definitions.definition: The act of bending or flexing; flexion .
A turn ; a bend ; a fold ; a curve .
A part of a machine designed to bend in operation.
A curve or bend in a tubular organ .
The last joint , or bend, of the wing of a bird .

The small distortion of an astronomical instrument caused by the weight of its parts; the amount to be added or subtracted from the observed readings of the instrument to correct them for this distortion.

main_definition: The act of bending or flexing; flexion .
secondary_definitions: A turn ; a bend ; a fold ; a curve .
( engineering ) A part of a machine designed to bend in operation.
( anatomy ) A curve or bend in a tubular organ .
( zoology ) The last joint , or bend, of the wing of a bird .

( astronomy ) The small distortion of an astronomical instrument caused by the weight of its parts; the amount to be added or subtracted from the observed readings of the instrument to correct them for this distortion.
